--- alter_table_alter_column_set_default.sql
ALTER TABLE actions ALTER COLUMN output SET DEFAULT("")
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 19,
    Name:    "actions",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AlterColumnSet{
    Alter: 20,
    Name:  &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 33,
      NameEnd: 39,
      Name:    "output",
    },
    Options:     (*ast.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    DefaultExpr: &ast.ColumnDefaultExpr{
      Default: 44,
      Rparen:  54,
      Expr:    &ast.StringLiteral{
        ValuePos: 52,
        ValueEnd: 54,
        Value:    "",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE actions ALTER COLUMN output SET DEFAULT ("")
